techQuotes.quote: Technology is best when it brings people together.
techQuotes.author: Matt Mullenweg

techQuotes.quote: The science of today is the technology of tomorrow.
techQuotes.author: Edward Teller

techQuotes.quote: It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity.
techQuotes.author: Albert Einstein

techQuotes.quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
techQuotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

techQuotes.quote: The real problem is not whether machines think but whether men do.
techQuotes.author: B.F. Skinner

techQuotes.quote: Technology like art is a soaring exercise of the human imagination.
techQuotes.author: Daniel Bell

techQuotes.quote: The great myth of our times is that technology is communication.
techQuotes.author: Libby Larsen

techQuotes.quote: The human spirit must prevail over technology.
techQuotes.author: Albert Einstein

techQuotes.quote: Technology is nothing. What's important is that you have faith in people.
techQuotes.author: Steve Jobs

techQuotes.quote: It's not a faith in technology. It's faith in people.
techQuotes.author: Steve Jobs

techQuotes.quote: We are stuck with technology when what we really want is just stuff that works.
techQuotes.author: Douglas Adams

techQuotes.quote: The real danger is not that computers will begin to think like men, but that men will begin to think like computers.
techQuotes.author: Sydney Harris

techQuotes.quote: Technology should improve your life, not become your life.
techQuotes.author: Billy Cox

techQuotes.quote: Just because something doesn't do what you planned it to do doesn't mean it's useless.
techQuotes.author: Thomas Edison

techQuotes.quote: Innovation is the outcome of a habit, not a random act.
techQuotes.author: Sukant Ratnakar

techQuotes.quote: Technology over technique produces emotionless design.
techQuotes.author: Daniel Mall

techQuotes.quote: Computers are useless. They can only give you answers.
techQuotes.author: Pablo Picasso

techQuotes.quote: Everybody gets so much information all day long that they lose their common sense.
techQuotes.author: Gertrude Stein

techQuotes.quote: The most technologically efficient machine that man has ever invented is the book.
techQuotes.author: Northrop Frye

techQuotes.quote: The purpose of technology is not to confuse the brain but to serve the body.
techQuotes.author: William S. Burroughs

techQuotes.quote: Technology feeds on itself. Technology makes more technology possible.
techQuotes.author: Alvin Toffler

techQuotes.quote: The art challenges the technology, and the technology inspires the art.
techQuotes.author: John Lasseter

techQuotes.quote: Technology will never replace great teachers, but technology in the hands of great teachers is transformational.
techQuotes.author: George Couros

techQuotes.quote: Technology is a useful servant but a dangerous master.
techQuotes.author: Christian Lous Lange

techQuotes.quote: It's not that we use technology, we live technology.
techQuotes.author: Godfrey Reggio

techQuotes.quote: Technology is the campfire around which we tell our stories.
techQuotes.author: Laurie Anderson

techQuotes.quote: The greatest achievement of humanity is not its works of art, science, or technology, but the recognition of its own dysfunction.
techQuotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

techQuotes.quote: Our technology forces us to live mythically.
techQuotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

techQuotes.quote: Technological progress has merely provided us with more efficient means for going backwards.
techQuotes.author: Aldous Huxley

techQuotes.quote: We are changing the world with technology.
techQuotes.author: Bill Gates

techQuotes.quote: The Internet is becoming the town square for the global village of tomorrow.
techQuotes.author: Bill Gates

techQuotes.quote: The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't really even notice it, so it's part of everyday life.
techQuotes.author: Bill Gates

techQuotes.quote: The new information technology… Internet and e-mail… have practically eliminated the physical costs of communications.
techQuotes.author: Peter Drucker

techQuotes.quote: If you think technology can solve your security problems, then you don't understand the problems and you don't understand the technology.
techQuotes.author: Bruce Schneier

techQuotes.quote: The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't really even notice it.
techQuotes.author: Bill Gates

techQuotes.quote: We are continually faced with great opportunities which are brilliantly disguised as unsolvable problems.
techQuotes.author: Margaret Mead

techQuotes.quote: The real question is, when will we draft an artificial intelligence bill of rights? What will that consist of? And who will get to decide that?
techQuotes.author: Gray Scott

techQuotes.quote: AI is likely to be either the best or worst thing to happen to humanity.
techQuotes.author: Stephen Hawking

techQuotes.quote: The question of whether a computer can think is no more interesting than the question of whether a submarine can swim.
techQuotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

techQuotes.quote: The great thing about technology is that it can help us become more human again.
techQuotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

techQuotes.quote: We're still in the first minutes of the first day of the Internet revolution.
techQuotes.author: Scott Cook

techQuotes.quote: The real revolution is not AI, but how we choose to use it.
techQuotes.author: Jean-Philippe Desbiolles

techQuotes.quote: Programming isn't about what you know; it's about what you can figure out.
techQuotes.author: Chris Pine

techQuotes.quote: Innovation is the calling card of the future.
techQuotes.author: Anna Eshoo

techQuotes.quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
techQuotes.author: Albert Einstein

techQuotes.quote: Don't compare yourself to others. Compare yourself to the person you were yesterday.
techQuotes.author: Anonymous

techQuotes.quote: Don't worry if it doesn't work right. If everything did, you'd be out of a job.
techQuotes.author: Mosher's Law of Software Engineering

techQuotes.quote: First we build the tools, then they build us.
techQuotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

techQuotes.quote: In a world that's changing really quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
techQuotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

techQuotes.quote: Technology is a word that describes something that doesn't work yet.
techQuotes.author: Douglas Adams
